div.p: This resource is an leaf-node observation of a a mammography calcification type. It is referenced by an parent Observation section that references other information about this specific abnormality Observation.value[x] is a single codeableConcept, and is bound to one of the following values

ul.li: MilkOfCalcium - Milk of Calcium Calcification (Typically Benign)
Fine Pleomorphic - Fine Pleomorphic Calcification (Suspicious Morphology)
FineLinear - Fine Linear or Fine-Linear Branching Calcification (Suspicious Morphology)
